desc: Stop waiting around for your nail polish to dry and enjoy perfectly manicured nails every day with Nailcation nail wraps. - Easy to apply - Long lasting - Won't damage your nails - Heaps of colours and designs to choose from Save money on expensive nail salon visits and DIY your manicure with premium nail wraps.

layout.text: The more you buy, the more you save! Use code 15OFF at checkout when purchasing 3 or more nail wraps!
